original: <color=#bceea7>$city1</color>樹上開花計謀完美成功！<color=#bceea7>3個月</color>內，偽裝我方武將數<color=#13ccd7>大增5成</color>，敵方或心生畏懼不敢來攻！(<color=#bceea7>樹上開花 大成功</color>)
text: The <color=#bceea7>$city1</color> tree blossoming strategy is a perfect success! In <color=#bceea7>3 months</color>, the number of camouflaged generals on our side is <color=#13ccd7>increased by 50%</color>, and the enemy may be afraid to attack! (<color=#bceea7>Blooming on the tree, great success</color>)
